results.title: Effect of beta-adrenoceptor antagonists on prevalence of peripheral vascular symptoms in hypertensive patients.
results.text_hl: Effect of beta-adrenoceptor antagonists on prevalence of @<m>DISEASE_Peripheral_Vascular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016491 @@@peripheral vascular symptoms@@@ in @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

results.title: Long-term treatment with losartan versus atenolol improves insulin sensitivity in hypertension: ICARUS, a LIFE substudy.
results.text_hl: We hypothesized that treatment with @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@ as compared to @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ would improve @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ sensitivity through regression of @<m>DISEASE_Peripheral_Vascular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016491 @@@peripheral vascular hypertrophy@@@/rarefaction.

citations.NLM: Olsen MH, Fossum E, Høieggen A, Wachtell K, Hjerkinn E, Nesbitt SD, Andersen UB, Phillips RA, Gaboury CL, Ibsen H, Kjeldsen SE, Julius S. Long-term treatment with losartan versus atenolol improves insulin sensitivity in hypertension: ICARUS, a LIFE substudy. J Hypertens. 2005 Apr;23(4):891-8. PMID: 15775796

results.title: Pharmacological characteristics of beta blockers and their role in clinical practice.
results.text_hl: Cardioselectivity refers to the ability of some drugs, notably @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Metoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008790 @@@metoprolol@@@, to block beta 1 receptors without blocking beta 2 receptors.

citations.NLM: McDevitt DG. Pharmacological characteristics of beta blockers and their role in clinical practice. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol. 1986;8 Suppl 6():S5-11. PMID: 2439820
citations.BibTeX: @article{2439820, title={Pharmacological characteristics of beta blockers and their role in clinical practice.}, author={McDevitt DG}, journal={J Cardiovasc Pharmacol}, volume={8 Suppl 6}, pages={S5-11}}

results.title: Study population and treatment titration in the International Nifedipine GITS Study: Intervention as a Goal in Hypertension Treatment (INSIGHT).
results.text_hl: This was followed by four optional increases in treatment: dose-doubling of the primary drug, addition of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ 25/50 mg or @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@ 5/10 mg, and then any other @DISEASE_Hypotension @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@hypotensive@@@ drug excluding calcium blockers or diuretics.

citations.NLM: Brown MJ, Castaigne A, de Leeuw PW, Mancia G, Rosenthal T, Ruilope LM. Study population and treatment titration in the International Nifedipine GITS Study: Intervention as a Goal in Hypertension Treatment (INSIGHT). J Hypertens. 1998 Dec;16(12 Pt 2):2113-6. PMID: 9886905
